result.title: /gym/100283/problem/H special judge is broken.
result.content:
I was training in the gym. When I tried to solve the problem H in ECPC 2013(gym number 100283), I've got Denial of judgement verdict. See 6939694.

I suspect that the special judge for the problem crashes. I have little clue how to fix the crashes. Could anyone give me an advice? I'd love to do some work if necessary.
